title: ScssifyToken Executor Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the ScssifyToken executor, which converts design tokens from JSON to SCSS format.

files.description: Paths to the JSON files containing the design tokens to be converted into SCSS variables.

exclude.description: Patterns or directories to exclude from the token conversion process.

parser.description: Defines the parser to be used for converting design tokens to SCSS. Use 'design-tokens-manager' for the Figma plugin Design Tokens Manager.

skipTokenTypes.description: Specifies the types of design tokens to exclude from conversion. This allows customization of which token types to process or ignore.

color.description: Defines the format for the output color values in SCSS/CSS. The default setting is 'hex'.

dimension.description: Determines the unit of measurement for dimension tokens when converted to SCSS/CSS. The default is set to 'pixel'.

outputDir.description: Specifies the directory where the generated token files will be stored.

themeName.description: The name of the theme for which the design tokens are being converted. This helps in identifying different themes within your project configurations.
